tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE Shows (
    show_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    show_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    airing_time TIMESTAMP,
    viewership INT,
    advertising_revenue DECIMAL(10, 2)
)

CREATE TABLE TV_Shows (
    show_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    show_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    genre VARCHAR(50),
    release_year INT,
    director_name VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE Viewership_Stats (
    stats_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    show_id UUID REFERENCES TV_Shows(show_id),
    viewership_count INT,
    average_rating FLOAT,
    viewer_demographics JSONB
);

CREATE TABLE Advertising_Revenue (
    revenue_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    show_id UUID REFERENCES TV_Shows(show_id),
    revenue_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    advertiser_name VARCHAR(100),
    ad_duration INTERVAL
);

CREATE TABLE Broadcast_Schedule (
    schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    show_id UUID REFERENCES TV_Shows(show_id),
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP,
    channel VARCHAR(50)
);
